body_html:
Hi Allen, I wonder if you could help me with a problem I'm having with the Mandelbrot tuorial. When the final statement is executed I get:

DisplayFractal(ns.eval())
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "", line 12, in DisplayFractal
File "PIL/Image.py", line 1439, in save
save_handler(self, fp, filename)
File "PIL/JpegImagePlugin.py", line 471, in _save
ImageFile._save(im, fp, [("jpeg", (0,0)+im.size, 0, rawmode)])
File "PIL/ImageFile.py", line 476, in _save
fh = fp.fileno()
io.UnsupportedOperation: fileno

Looking around it seems there might be some problem with IPython redirecting io streams but i don't know what I can do about it. Thanks.

body:
Hi Allen, I wonder if you could help me with a problem I'm having with the Mandelbrot tuorial.  When the final statement is executed I get:

>>> DisplayFractal(ns.eval())
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "<stdin>", line 12, in DisplayFractal
  File "PIL/Image.py", line 1439, in save
    save_handler(self, fp, filename)
  File "PIL/JpegImagePlugin.py", line 471, in _save
    ImageFile._save(im, fp, [("jpeg", (0,0)+im.size, 0, rawmode)])
  File "PIL/ImageFile.py", line 476, in _save
    fh = fp.fileno()
io.UnsupportedOperation: fileno
>>> 

Looking around it seems there might be some problem with IPython redirecting io streams but i don't know what I can do about it.  Thanks.
